item.forcemaster_rpg.knuckle.description: Knuckles have a small chance to knock up the target.
spell.forcemaster_rpg.arcane_blast.descr: Charging up blasts, piercing thru {pierce} targets, dealing {damage} arcane-damage.
spell.forcemaster_rpg.arcane_blast.name: Arcane Blast
spell.forcemaster_rpg.asal.description: Concentrated strike, deals {damage_1} arcane- and {damage_2} physical-damage, exhausts the caster.
spell.forcemaster_rpg.asal.name: Asalraalaikum
spell.forcemaster_rpg.barq_esna.descript: Makes target vulnerable to arcane-damage, weakens its damage & increases the chance to crit on target.
spell.forcemaster_rpg.barq_esna.name: Baraqijal Esna
spell.forcemaster_rpg.belial_smashing.de: Charges to direction, knocking up targets and dealing {damage} physical-damage.
spell.forcemaster_rpg.burstcrack.descrip: Smashes the ground hard, dealing {damage} physical-damage and knock up targets.
spell.forcemaster_rpg.burstcrack.name: Burst Crack
spell.forcemaster_rpg.improved_burstcrac: Increases the range of Burstcrack by {range_add}.
spell.forcemaster_rpg.sonichand.descript: Punches continuously in the air creating vacuum, deals {damage_1} arcane- and {damage_2} physical-damage
spell.forcemaster_rpg.sonichand.name: Sonichand
spell.forcemaster_rpg.stonehand.descript: {trigger_chance_1} chance for {effect_duration} seconds to stun targets on damage, only with fist weapons.
spell.forcemaster_rpg.stonehand.name: Stonehand
